ddl_create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS oasisreport (xmlns TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (xmlns));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS messageheader (timedate TEXT, source TEXT, version TEXT, oasisreport_xmlns TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (oasisreport_xmlns) REFERENCES oasisreport(xmlns), PRIMARY KEY (timedate, source, version));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS messagepayload (id TEXT, oasisreport_xmlns TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (oasisreport_xmlns) REFERENCES oasisreport(xmlns), PRIMARY KEY (id));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rto (name TEXT, messagepayload_id TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (messagepayload_id) REFERENCES messagepayload(id), PRIMARY KEY (name));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_item (id TEXT, rto_name TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (rto_name) REFERENCES rto(name), PRIMARY KEY (id));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_header (tz TEXT, interval TEXT, uom TEXT, sec_per_interval INTEGER, system TEXT, report TEXT, report_item_id TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (report_item_id) REFERENCES report_item(id), PRIMARY KEY (tz, interval, uom, sec_per_interval, system, report));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_data (interval_num INTEGER, interval_start_gmt TEXT, opr_date TEXT, resource_name TEXT, interval_end_gmt TEXT, data_item TEXT, value REAL, report_item_id TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (report_item_id) REFERENCES report_item(id), PRIMARY KEY (interval_num, interval_start_gmt, opr_date, resource_name, interval_end_gmt, data_item, value));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS disclaimer_item (disclaimer TEXT, rto_name TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (rto_name) REFERENCES rto(name), PRIMARY KEY (disclaimer));
description: From: Interface Specification for OASIS 2019 Independent Release Version: 5.1.8 2/15/2019
data from the prior seven days for each hour of
name: data-oasis-as-mileage-calc-all
sql_queries: select value, uom, interval_start_posix, data_item, resource_name from oasis
variants: RMD_AVG_MIL : Average Instructed Mileage for regulation mileage down
RMD_SYS_MIL_MUL : System Mileage Multiplier for regulation mileage down
RMD_SYS_PERF_ACC : System Performance Accuracy for regulation mileage up
RMU_AVG_MIL : Average Instructed Mileage for regulation mileage up
RMU_SYS_MIL_MUL : System Mileage Multiplier for regulation mileage up
RMU_SYS_PERF_ACC : System Performance Accuracy for regulation mileage up
